long_description: Thoughtfully designed, the Patagonia Innerspace tank top offers the perfect level of comfort for mindful practice. Performance fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and feels soft against skin. Internal shelf bra with mesh insets provides soft support. Hip-length fabric. The Patagonia Innerspace tank top has a slim fit.
short_description: Thoughtfully designed, the Patagonia Innerspace tank top offers the perfect level of comfort for mindful practice.
